inclusion.criterion: age ≥18 years on day of signing informed consent form
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: recent injecting drug use (within the previous 6 months)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: eligible for DAA therapy as per the PBS
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: unable or unwilling to provide informed consent or abide by the requirements of the study
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has chronic HCV infection and is eligible for DAA therapy. However, he has a history of recent coinfection with HBV which may be relevant to his treatment plan.
